comments.body: Can you use Connection.get_uri method here?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +84,88 @@            msg = msg.format(conn_id=new_conn.conn_id,
                             uri=args.conn_uri or
                             urlunparse((args.conn_type,
                                         '{login}:{password}@{host}:{port}'
                                             .format(login=args.conn_login or '',

comments.body: I think it is worth giving the option to choose the format with the additional --format parameter. This will overwrite the value detected based on the file name.

Users may not have an extension if exporting to a temporary file - `mktemp`.
```bash
TMP_FILE="$(mktemp)"
airflow connections export "${TMP_FILE}" --format=json
scp "${TMP_FILE}" mik-laj@yourserver:/home/mik-laj/backup/export-$(hostname)
rm "${TMP_FILE}"
```
Is this use case correct for you?
Yes, Will add this, along with the documentation.
